title: Endorsement
description: A lightweight attestation indicating support, trust, or approval for a DID-identified subject. The 'attestationType' field may be used to distinguish informal endorsements from formal approvals.

@context.description: Optional JSON-LD context URI for semantic processing.

attester.title: Attester ID
attester.description: DID or address of the entity issuing the endorsement or approval.

subject.title: Subject ID
subject.description: DID of the entity being endorsed or approved.

subjectDidHash.title: Subject DID Hash
subjectDidHash.description: Keccak256 hash of the canonicalized subject DID, encoded as 0x-prefixed hex string (32 bytes).

payloadVersion.title: Payload Version
payloadVersion.description: Semver describing the shape of 'payload' (additive changes may bump this without a new schema UID).

payloadSpecURI.title: Payload Specification URI
payloadSpecURI.description: URI to the human/machine-readable spec for the current payloadVersion (e.g., IPFS/HTTPS).

policyURI.title: Policy URI
policyURI.description: Optional URI pointing to the criteria or process used for formal approvals.

issuedAt.title: Issued Date
issuedAt.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the attestation was issued.

effectiveAt.title: Effective Date
effectiveAt.description: Optional Unix timestamp when the endorsement or approval becomes effective.

expiresAt.title: Expiration Date
expiresAt.description: Optional Unix timestamp after which the endorsement or approval expires.
